    • 方法详细资料

      • isBeanDefinitionPresent

        public static boolean isBeanDefinitionPresent​(org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanDefinitionRegistry registry,
                                              java.lang.String beanName,
                                              java.lang.Class<?> targetBeanClass)
        Is BeanDefinition present in BeanDefinitionRegistry
        参数:
        registry - BeanDefinitionRegistry
        beanName - the name of bean
        targetBeanClass - the type of bean
        返回:
        If Present , return true

      • registerInfrastructureBean

        public static void registerInfrastructureBean​(org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanDefinitionRegistry registry,
                                              java.lang.String beanName,
                                              java.lang.Class<?> beanClass,
                                              java.lang.Object... constructorArgs)
        Register Infrastructure Bean
        参数:
        registry - BeanDefinitionRegistry
        beanName - the name of bean
        beanClass - the class of bean
        constructorArgs - the arguments of Constructor

      • getGlobalPropertiesBean

        public static java.util.Properties getGlobalPropertiesBean​(org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactory beanFactory)
                                                    throws org.springframework.beans.factory.NoSuchBeanDefinitionException
        Get Global Properties Bean
        参数:
        beanFactory - BeanFactory
        返回:
        Global Properties Bean
        抛出:
        org.springframework.beans.factory.NoSuchBeanDefinitionException - if there is no such bean definition
